A must-read roundup of our most popular stories of the week.

In case you missed them, we've rounded up our most popular stories of the week to help you stay in the loop. No need to thank us — just toast a brunch mimosa in our honor when you're discussing who did what over your avocado toast.

TYLA ON HER STYLE INFLUENCES, EMBRACING EMERGING DESIGNERS AND GETTING FREE HANDBAGS
The South African singer tells Fashionista about her new campaign with Bose and what inspires the Y2K aesthetic for which she's become known.

THE NEXT COSTUME INSTITUTE EXHIBIT WILL CELEBRATE BLACK DANDYISM
"Superfine: Tailoring Black Style" will examine the history of the Black dandy. A$AP Rocky, Pharrell Williams, Colman Domingo, Lewis Hamilton and Anna Wintour will serve as Met Gala co-chairs.

CULT GAIA AND GAP REVEAL HOLIDAY COLLABORATION
The 35-piece collection, featuring a range of winter-ready styles, launches on Oct. 10.

FASHION HISTORY LESSON: THE VICTORIA'S SECRET FASHION SHOW
All you need to know about the television spectacular that transformed the lingerie industry, before it returns Oct. 15.

BEYONCÉ EMBRACES THE BUTTER YELLOW TREND AT THE 2024 'GLAMOUR' WOMEN OF THE YEAR AWARDS
The star made a rare appearance at the celebratory event in New York City on Tuesday.

THIS NEW YORK-BASED DESIGNER WANTS TO REVIVE THE TRADITION OF AMERICAN COUTURE
Barshai is honoring the legacy of couture craftsmanship for a modern, diverse clientele Ready-to-wear is next.

MERIT BEAUTY ENTERS THE FRAGRANCE CATEGORY WITH VINTAGE-INSPIRED SCENT
CMO Aila Morin unpacks the brand's "old-school" launch strategy and perfumer Fanny Bal shares the inspirations behind the $92 extrait de parfum.

WHAT BUYERS ARE BUYING FROM THE SPRING 2025 RUNWAYS
Your first look at what's likely to hit stores next season.

MEGHAN MARKLE WORE A THING: RE-WORN RED CAROLINA HERRERA GOWN EDITION
The Duchess of Sussex revived a past look while attending the 2024 Children's Hospital Los Angeles Gala.

HOW CICLO'S ANDREA FERRIS TURNED HER IDEA FOR BIODEGRADABLE POLYESTER INTO A GROUNDBREAKING REALITY
"You do not need to be an expert in the industry to break into it, and you don't even have to be an expert to have an idea and implement it," she shared on The Fashionista Network.

SOCIAL STUDIES IS A NEW RETAIL CONCEPT FOR 'SUSTAINABLE' INDIE FASHION BRANDS
It offers an online curation of chic indie brands like Ganni, St. Agni and Collina Strada — all vetted based on their ethical and environmental standards. Brick-and-mortar is next.
